meanings.sent1: The sudden rainstorm was an unforeseen event.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to handle an unforeseen situation in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: It was unforeseen that the cat would chase the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The unforeseen delay caused chaos at the airport.
meanings.sent5: The unforeseen guest arrived just in time for dinner.
